posts.post_content:
Currently, I am hoping to sell a t3 Home Run Baker that I recently traded for. At first, I was planning on keeping this card, but have found something else I want instead...Very nice card with two pinholes and it has the Ad back with I haven't seen as often as the other back...While this card is by no means rare, it isn't seen that often...Email with any questions...

Price is $300.00

Travis
[url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]
